      java.lang.String addToDressingRoom​(java.lang.String team)
      //corregir Method: addToDressingRoom
      This method let the user add a team at a dressing room and save it (the method will save it at the dressing room that still have capacity)
      pre: there must be players hired and belong to a team
      pos: a new team added to a dressing room depending on the available capacity

      java.lang.String fireEmployee​(java.lang.String team, java.lang.String employee, java.lang.String idEmployee)
      Method fireEmployee
      This method let the user fire a Coach (main or assistant) and a player of a team
      pre: there must be almost an employee hire, that means , the arrays of players and the coaches must be different of null
      pos: an Employee fired, taken out of the array players if its a player or removed from a team if its a coach and finally its status changed to INACTIVE

      • hireEmployee

        public java.lang.String hireEmployee​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     double salary,
                                     java.lang.String numberShirt,
                                     int numberGoals,
                                     java.lang.String position,
                                     java.lang.String team)
        Method: hireEmployee
        This method let the user hire a new employee, at this method the user can hire a Player for Team A or Team B
        pos:
        pre: a new player hire and added to the arraylist employees and added to the team chosen by the user
        Parameters:
        name - , the name of the player
        id - , the id of the player
        salary - , the salary of the player
        numberShirt - , the number of the shirt for the player
        numberGoals - , the number of goals of the player
        position - , the position in which the player plays
        team - , the team chosen by the user
        Returns:
        String , a message telling if the player joined the team or saying that the team is full

      • hireEmployee

        public java.lang.String hireEmployee​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     double salary,
                                     int experienceYears,
                                     int teamsEncharged,
                                     int wonChampionships,
                                     java.lang.String team)
        Method: hireEmployee
        This method let the user hire a new employee, at this method the user can hire a Main coach
        pre:
        pos: a new Main coach hired and added to the arraylist employees
        Parameters:
        name - , the name of the Main coach
        id - , the id of the coach
        salary - , the salary for the Main coach
        experienceYears - , the years that the coach has been a Main coach
        teamsEncharged - , the team that the coach manage
        wonChampionships - , the amount of championships that the teams managed by the coach has won
        team - , the team selected for the coach
        Returns:
        String , with a message

      • hireEmployee

        public java.lang.String hireEmployee​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     double salary,
                                     int experienceYears,
                                     boolean wasPlayer,
                                     java.lang.String skill,
                                     java.lang.String team)
        Method: hireEmployee
        This method let the user hire a new employee, at this method the user can hire a Coach assistant
        pre:
        pos: A new Coach assistant and added to the arraylist employees
        Parameters:
        name - , the mane of the coach
        id - , the id of the coach
        salary - , the salary for the coach
        experienceYears - , the years that the coach has been a coach
        wasPlayer - , if the boolean has been a player
        skill - , the skill in which the coach specializes
        team - , the team selected for the coach
        Returns:
        String , with a message

      • fireEmployee

        public java.lang.String fireEmployee​(java.lang.String team,
                                     java.lang.String employee,
                                     java.lang.String idEmployee)
        Method fireEmployee
        This method let the user fire a Coach (main or assistant) and a player of a team
        pre: there must be almost an employee hire, that means , the arrays of players and the coaches must be different of null
        pos: an Employee fired, taken out of the array players if its a player or removed from a team if its a coach and finally its status changed to INACTIVE
        Parameters:
        team - , the team selected for the user
        employee - , the type of employee that the user wants to fire
        idEmployee - , the id of the employee that will be fired, there must not be an id repeated
        Returns:
        String, with a message

      • addToDressingRoom

        public java.lang.String addToDressingRoom​(java.lang.String team)
        //corregir Method: addToDressingRoom
        This method let the user add a team at a dressing room and save it (the method will save it at the dressing room that still have capacity)
        pre: there must be players hired and belong to a team
        pos: a new team added to a dressing room depending on the available capacity
        Parameters:
        team - , the team of the player that will be added
        Returns:
        String a message saying where the player got in or saying that the player couldn't get it because of te security protocols

      • newLineUp

        public void newLineUp​(java.lang.String lineUp,
                      java.lang.String team,
                      java.lang.String tactics,
                      java.lang.String date)
        Method: newLineUp
        This method let the user set a new Line up for a team
        pre: the string of the line up must contains "-" in order to do the split
        pos: a new Line up set and created
        Parameters:
        lineUp - , the input with the formation of the line up
        team - , the team which will have the new line up
        tactics - , the kind of tactic that the line up will have
        date - , the date of creation of the line up

      • lineUpInfo

        public java.lang.String lineUpInfo​(java.lang.String team,
                                   java.lang.String date)
        Method: lineUpInfo
        This method let the user see all the lines up set for a team
        pre: the date for looking the line up that the user wants must follow the format dd/mm/yy
        pos:
        Parameters:
        team - , the team chosen by the user , this team must have a line up already set
        date - , the date of the line up which must follow the format dd/mm/yy
        Returns:
        String with all the lines up of a team or an specific one
